Html:
Hi,

I'm using SPMetal to general code for one of our big sharepoint lists that has several lookups into other lists.
One of those other lists has 2 calculated fields to concat "Last Name" and "First Name" fields into a "Full Name" field using the formula:

=[Last Name]&","&" "&[First Name]

SPMetal seems to throw an error when it encounters those fields:

Invalid Lookup field list reference encountered: list {a1cc3412-9fb5-4387-98ea-5e4cc93ea259} referred to by field Main_x0020_Contact is unknown in the SharePoint context.

The list the error references does exist.

Can anyone advise if SPMetal should be able to cope with these calculated fields?

Thanks

JKI
